org.cougaar.core.qos.ca
Interface CoordinationArtifactProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlarmCoordinationArtifactProvider, BeanCoordinationArtifactProvider, CoordinationArtifactProviderImpl, FrameCoordinationArtifactProvider, MetricsServiceCoordinationArtifactProvider, QueryResponseCoordinationArtifactProvider
public interface CoordinationArtifactProvider

See the package javadoc for more details on CoordinationArtifactProviders. They provide a family of CoordinationArtifacts, all of which have the same set of roles and parameters.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getArtifactKind()
          Returns the kind of Artifacts the Provider can make.
 void provideFacet(ConnectionSpec spec, RolePlayer player)
          This method is used by the CoordinationArtifactBroker to request the Provider to provide a Facet for the given RolePlayer.
 boolean supports(ConnectionSpec spec)
          Returns true iff the Provider can handle the given spec.
 

Method Detail

getArtifactKind

java.lang.String getArtifactKind()
Returns the kind of Artifacts the Provider can make.

supports

boolean supports(ConnectionSpec spec)
Returns true iff the Provider can handle the given spec. The default implementation in CoordinationArtifactProviderPlugin returns true iff the spec's ca_kind equals the Provider's artifact kind.

provideFacet

void provideFacet(ConnectionSpec spec,
                  RolePlayer player)
This method is used by the CoordinationArtifactBroker to request the Provider to provide a Facet for the given RolePlayer. The job of the provider is to find or make an appropriate CoordinationArtifact, given the spec. The artifact itself will do the actual linkage between the Facet and the RolePlayer.
